public class Queries extends ConfiguredQueries<com.orientechnologies.orient.core.sql.query.OSQLSynchQuery<com.orientechnologies.orient.core.record.impl.ODocument>,org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryRequest,List<com.orientechnologies.orient.core.record.impl.ODocument>>
Configured and add-hoc query support on OrientDB Queries can contain tokens of the format ${token-name}

    void
    setConfiguredQueries(Map<String,String> queries)
    Set the pre-configured queries, which are identified by a query identifier and can be invoked using this identifier Success to set the queries does not mean they are valid as some can only be validated at query execution time.

  • Method Details

    • setConfiguredQueries

      public void setConfiguredQueries(Map<String,String> queries)
      Set the pre-configured queries, which are identified by a query identifier and can be invoked using this identifier Success to set the queries does not mean they are valid as some can only be validated at query execution time.
      Overrides:
      setConfiguredQueries in class ConfiguredQueries<com.orientechnologies.orient.core.sql.query.OSQLSynchQuery<com.orientechnologies.orient.core.record.impl.ODocument>,org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryRequest,List<com.orientechnologies.orient.core.record.impl.ODocument>>
      Parameters:
      queries - the complete list of configured queries, mapping from query id to the query expression which may optionally contain tokens in the form ${token-name}.

    • createQueryObject

      protected com.orientechnologies.orient.core.sql.query.OSQLSynchQuery<com.orientechnologies.orient.core.record.impl.ODocument> createQueryObject(String queryString)
      Create an SQL synchronous query returning an ODocument containing the query result.
      Specified by:
      createQueryObject in class ConfiguredQueries<com.orientechnologies.orient.core.sql.query.OSQLSynchQuery<com.orientechnologies.orient.core.record.impl.ODocument>,org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryRequest,List<com.orientechnologies.orient.core.record.impl.ODocument>>
      Parameters:
      queryString - the query expression, including tokens to replace
      Returns:
      the prepared query object

    • query

      public List<com.orientechnologies.orient.core.record.impl.ODocument> query(String type, org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryRequest request, com.orientechnologies.orient.core.db.document.ODatabaseDocumentTx database) throws org.forgerock.json.resource.BadRequestException
      Execute a query, either a pre-configured query by using the query ID, or a query expression passed as part of the params. The keys for the input parameters as well as the return map entries are in QueryConstants.
      Specified by:
      query in class ConfiguredQueries<com.orientechnologies.orient.core.sql.query.OSQLSynchQuery<com.orientechnologies.orient.core.record.impl.ODocument>,org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryRequest,List<com.orientechnologies.orient.core.record.impl.ODocument>>
      Parameters:
      type - the relative/local resource name, which needs to be converted to match the OrientDB document class name
      request - the query request, including parameters which include the query id, or the query expression, as well as the token key/value pairs to replace in the query
      database - a handle to a database connection instance for exclusive use by the query method whilst it is executing.
      Returns:
      The query result, which includes meta-data about the query, and the result set itself.
      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.resource.BadRequestException - if the passed request parameters are invalid, e.g. missing query id or query expression or tokens.
